description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are trapped in a matrix, your salvation is to get to the center. At each step, the matrix will rotate and will make you fall in its traps. The time will not be your friend. Good luck!
